thread.title: Teresa Giudice’s mother dies at age 66 | Page Six
thread.title_full: Teresa Giudice’s mother dies at age 66 | Page Six

author: Christine Burroni
title: Teresa Giudice’s mother dies at age 66 | Page Six
text:
Mommy I love you so much ❤️ #daughtersloveforhermom 
A post shared by Teresa Giudice (@teresagiudice) on Dec 19, 2016 at 5:25pm PST 
Teresa Giudice ‘s mother, Antonia Gorga, has died. She was 66.
“Teresa has been in the hospital with her and is inconsolable now,” a source told Us Weekly. 
Her cause of death is unclear.
The matriarch of the Gorga family, who is also mom to “Real Housewives of New Jersey” cast members Joe Gorga and the mother-in-law to Melissa Gorga, appeared at various times on the reality show.
She was a grandmother to seven children — one of whom is named after her.
The magazine also mentioned that Teresa, 44, has been in contact with her husband Joe Giudice, who is is serving 41 months in prison for numerous fraud charges.
Reps for Teresa and Melissa did not immediately return request for comment.
